column1: BBC News NI outlines the latest data on coronavirus and Covid-19 vaccinations across Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.Nine more Covid-19-related deaths have been reported in Northern Ireland on Wednesday.Deaths are measured by recording those who died within 28 days of receiving a positive result in a test for coronavirus.The total number of deaths linked to Covid-19 in Northern Ireland since the start of the pandemic is 2
column4: 114 cases recorded on Tuesday.That includes cases confirmed from samples taken in recent days

column8: down from 381 on Tuesday.There are currently 39 Covid patients in intensive care units
column9: up from 36 on Tuesday.Last updated 3 November at 14:15 BSTSource: Department of Health Northern IrelandA total of 2
